prompt: A group of people in a modern, open office environment, seen from a straight-on perspective, with a color palette transitioning from deep blue at the top to light cyan at the bottom. The scene features natural daylight, soft shadows, and a subtle, harmonious blend of colors in the background. People are engaged in casual conversation or focused work, with varied clothing styles and postures to add visual interest. The overall look is clean, inviting, and balanced, with no visible technology, screens, text, posters, or abstract elements.

A professional individual, confidently dressed in business casual attire, stands in a modern command center environment. The scene features a spacious, well-lit interior with glass walls, sleek furniture, and subtle metallic accents. In the background, diverse colleagues converse or collaborate around tables. The atmosphere is energetic yet focused, with natural daylight streaming through large windows. No screens, no technology, no visible text or posters.

A team of diverse engineers collaborating in a bright, modern workspace, gathered around a large table with notebooks, coffee cups, and mechanical parts. The environment features high ceilings, large windows with natural light, contemporary furniture, and potted plants. The group is engaged in discussion, gesturing and smiling, with some standing and others seated. No screens, no tech devices, no text, no posters, no whiteboards.
